## Transform.SetPreRotation method

Sets the pre-rotation represented in degree

```csharp
public Transform SetPreRotation(double rx, double ry, double rz)
```

### Examples

```csharp
Node node = new Node();
node.Transform.SetPreRotation(90, 0, 0);
```
